message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can call it a day!
You're starting too high, Alice. Let's try again!
You were too generous last time, Bob. This is my counteroffer!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not budging on this one!
You're not budging, Bob? Fine, I'll make a move. Take it or leave it!
You're really lowballing me now, Alice. I'm not going to take 1 cent!
Bob, we're running out of time. Meet me in the middle and let's split the remaining value!
You're trying to squeeze me out, Alice. I'm not going to give in that easily!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. We're running out of time and money!
You're really trying to get the last cent, Alice. I'm not going to let you have it!
This is my last, last offer, Bob. Take it and let's be done with this!
You're really desperate now, Alice. I'm not going to take 1 cent from you. I'm going to take it all!
